settings.title: Ask Coach
settings.desc:
Welcome to Optimal Health Bridge. Are you ready to take charge of your health and achieve your wellness goals naturally? Look no further! With over 30 years of experience as an Integrative Nutrition Pro Coach, I have empowered thousands of individuals to enhance their well-being through personalized nutritional support solutions.

I understand firsthand the challenges and triumphs that come with prioritizing cardiovascular wellness. I am here to guide you toward a healthier heart and overall vitality.

We believe in a “smarter, not harder,” approach to health. Our philosophy revolves around providing you with comprehensive knowledge and personalized guidance tailored to your unique needs. 

Have a burning question about your health? Don’t hesitate to ask Coach! I am here to provide insightful answers and support you every step of the way. Ask Coach!

settings.title: Conquer Your Health Goals With Ease
settings.desc:
When you have a health goal, it can feel like you’re an ocean’s away from where you are and where you want to be.

  • But with Optimal Health Bridge, we can help bridge that gap…
  • By giving you the nutritional resources & support you need to reach optimal health…
  • And live a better, more health-conscious life.
We offer expert health advice from experienced professionals…
Paired with nutrition-based solutions specific to your needs…
And hands-on support for those tough health challenges that are hard to face on your own.

settings.question: What product and services does OHB provide?
settings.answer:
OHB takes pride in promoting heart healthy solutions that we believe can make a huge difference in your life.

We offer expert health advice from experienced professionals, paired with nutrition-based solutions specific to your needs and hands-on support for those tough health challenges that are hard to face on your own.

You can meet with Coach Garey J Simmons, Integrative Nutrition Coach, to discuss your health concerns and he’ll be happy to walk you through best practices.


So whether you have heart issues, or you’re concerned about keeping your heart health safe, Optimal Health Bridge is here to support you on your better health journey.

settings.question: What's the difference between Fish Oil, Krill Oil, and Calamari Oil?
settings.answer:
Fish oil is the most popular natural source of Omega 3. the purest and most potent fish oils like True Omega 3 provide nearly a prescription level dose of EPA and DHA in good
balance.

Some lower quality fish oil can cause “fish burp”, the unpleasant aftertaste of fish after taking the supplement. But our True Omega 3 Fish Oil is made with high quality fish that doesn’t give you that fishy aftertaste.

Krill oil is extracted from tiny shellfish, and while it provides less Omega 3 than fish oil, some studies show that your body absorbs the Omega 3’s in Krill oil more easily. Plus, Krill oil contains a powerful antioxidant called Astaxanthan which has multiple benefits to your health. That’s why we include it in our Omega 3 Protocol.

Fish oil is the most popular natural source of Omega 3. the purest and most potent fish oils like True Omega 3 provide nearly a prescription level dose of EPA and DHA in good
balance.

Some lower quality fish oil can cause “fish burp”, the unpleasant aftertaste of
fish after taking the supplement. But our True Omega 3 Fish Oil is made with high quality fish that doesn’t give you that fishy aftertaste.

settings.question: How Much Cholestene Should I Take Daily?
settings.answer:
OHB’s Cholestene (Red Yeast Rice) is designed to support healthier cholesterol levels.  Research shows that an effective dose ranges between 1200mg and 2400 mg per day.

 

As with any new supplement you take, you will want to consult a healthcare professional to make sure it is safe for you, especially if you have any pre-existing conditions. Once you get clearance from your healthcare professional, please take Cholestene as directed.

settings.question: Who is Ubiquinol For?
settings.answer:
Our OHB Ubiquinol is for anyone who wants to protect their heart from damage due to high cholesterol or free radical causing inflammation.  You especially want to start using Ubiquinol if you are at increased risk for things such as:

Heart attack

Stroke

High blood pressure

High cholesterol

No matter your age, your heart health is no joke.  So taking precautionary steps now to protect your heart can save you from being blindsided by sickness. If you want to support your heart naturally, OHB Ubiquinol may be right for you.
